title: In the movies it doesn't hurt
creator_credit: Robert Young, Barry Palin and Illustra Films
brief_description: Made in a style similar to the “Carry on” movies, this very funny film shows what should and shouldn’t be done in a school laboratory. Sid James features in a film clip and cast also includes Bernard Bresslaw and John Merrigan. NB: Some equipment shown is not used in Australian schools. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
